name: Guntrast
description:
Game made for Trijam - 3 hour game jam. Theme: contrast.

Howdy!

I see yer a new sheriff here. Good. We've got a little problem with spiders and scorpions... Here, have a UV flashlight to spot 'em, and special revolver to neutralize 'em. How? When you spot an insect, pick a bullet with the most contrasting color and shoot it. Y'know, jus' choose the opposite color from the color wheel.

The more contrasting the color the more damage it deals. Shooting the insect with a bullet of the same color will heal it!

Be careful, those insects are quite dangerous. Let 'em bite you three times, and I'll have to look for another sheriff.

GAMEPLAY

Click A or D to change color of the bullet.
Move cursor to aim, press left mouse button to shoot.

AUDIO

Background music - Caffeine Creek Band from Pixabay
SFX under CC0 licence from Freesound
